g34439-d7940209.name_hotel: The Gates Hotel South Beach - a DoubleTree by Hilton
amenities: Fitness Centre with Gym / Workout Room
g34439-d7940209.description: The Gates Hotel South Beach is a new lifestyle boutique hotel offering guests an authentic and unconventional resort-style setting, just across the street from the Atlantic Ocean. Convenient to all that South Beach has to offer, it is walking distance to Ocean Drive, Lincoln Road and the area's renowned restaurants, nightlife, entertainment and shopping, and just a short drive to all of South Florida's best attractions.

Y-01-2021-glitterati786.review_text: Jordan the beach attendant was wonderful and access is only across the street! The front desk staff was also extremely helpful and courteous! Beautiful trendy hotel close to everything in south beach!
Y-01-2021-glitterati786.review_response:
Thanks for the splendid review!
It's fantastic you had such an excellent experience at The Gates Hotel South Beach and that our team took such great care of you. We want you to feel right at home as soon as you walk through our doors! Our team will love to hear they made such a wonderful impression on you.
We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you. Have a beautiful day!
Y-01-2021-glitterati786.review_responder: Response from LauraM17135, General Manager at The Gates Hotel South Beach - a DoubleTree by Hilton

Y-09-2020-GeorgeMarina.review_text:
My wife & I stayed at The Gates by Hilton for a weekend getaway. We enjoyed upon the lobby entry the incredible aroma of flowers & herbs. The reception attendant, Polina, was so courteous & professional, made such a great first impression. Throughout our stay, every hotel personal we met was friendly. 
The Gates restaurant, Ola, had superb friendly service. Luis, the waiter, made each morning a beautiful start. Luis every day was full of joy & treated everyone the same & with a great smile. Breakfast was always good & the coffee bold & full of smooth excellent flavor. 
Our room was very clean & well equipped. Look forward to staying again. I’m a Lifetime Diamond Honnors member & can confidently say this is well managed property.
Y-09-2020-GeorgeMarina.review_response:
Thanks for the wonderful review, George!
It's excellent you had such a fantastic experience at The Gates Hotel South Beach! We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests and your praise for our team lets us know we're doing our job. Polina is a valued member of our team so it's no surprise she took such great care of you. That's what we like to see!
We look forward to sharing another splendid experience with you soon! Have a lovely day!
Y-09-2020-GeorgeMarina.review_responder: Response from LauraM17135, General Manager at The Gates Hotel South Beach - a DoubleTree by Hilton

Y-12-2020-bearjames1.review_title: Don't stay here, they won't miss you
Y-12-2020-bearjames1.review_text: This has to be the worst stay I've had anywhere. First, check in is at 4pm but our room wasn't ready for us until nearly 6pm. We weren't alone as the lobby was full of countless others waiting even after ours was ready. Second, the front desk clerk told me my card would be authorized a total of $100 for a two night stay which is pretty standard. However, my card was authorized twice at $200 each. I was told DONT worry it'll fall off in 7 days! That's not the point. That's 4 times the amount I was advised, some folks might not have that type of flexibility with their cards. Third, I went from a top floor waterfront view with balcony on digital check in to a 5th floor room with only a view of ugly a/c units. Doors inside the room will not shut all the way, defeating the point of separate rooms. The entire evening (6pm until 1am+) has been filled with loud shouting, yelling, screaming, jumping, door slamming and wall banging. The front desk has apologized and promised to address the situation, yet things have only gotten louder and more out of control. So much for a relaxing beach trip, you won't get any sleep or peace here. They really don't care once you're stuck here.
Y-12-2020-bearjames1.review_response:
We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, James.
We're disheartened that you had such challenges with your billing and that our team didn't go above and beyond to accommodate your needs. We care deeply about the satisfaction of our guests so we'll be sure to discuss your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.
We hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.
Y-12-2020-bearjames1.review_responder: Response from LauraM17135, General Manager at The Gates Hotel South Beach - a DoubleTree by Hilton

Other than that hotel was ok . Ok
Y-12-2020-Sightsee251708.review_response:
Thank you for sharing your feedback.

Y-12-2020-Sightsee251708.review_responder: Response from LauraM17135, General Manager at The Gates Hotel South Beach - a DoubleTree by Hilton

Y-12-2020-SconsinWorldTraveler.review_title: Good hotel with some need of improvements
Y-12-2020-SconsinWorldTraveler.review_text:
Overall we principally enjoyed our stay at the Gates. The interior design was very beautiful and the staff at breakfast were very nice and accommodating.  
WALKING: In general we were able to walk everywhere from the hotel, but it is a bit of a hike if you are trying to get to the southern part of ocean drive.... but all is doable....  
BIKE RENTALS:  It states free two hours but the process to get the bikes is way too complicated, you need to download an app and then grab a voucher from the front desk, but the app doesn’t really explain how to enter the voucher. Also the hourly rates are much higher than the city rates, which is not understandable to be honest.  We gave up and walked due to things getting so complicated.  Plus you have to download on separate phones to get each bike.
BEACH Chairs:  Great option and always something available.  We enjoyed this option a lot.  Be aware - they don’t come with umbrellas, so bring your own or pay there.
POOL Area:  Very green and beautiful.  Drawbacks - needs a good pressure wash + more often in the shade than not.  Please building being constructed next store which creates more shade now.  DJ was a great Touch for Friday’s and Saturdays - wish there was more music like that during the week as well.  We loved the jacuzzi, nice view of channel next to the hotel.  Water was cold probably due to no heating and not being in the sun, but in warmer months I am sure it is fine (November was when we went.
ROOMS:  Unfortunately this was the biggest issue.  We booked a suite with balcony, but wasn’t available when we got there - they gave us a regular king room and a discount which we appreciated.  We had to ask several times when they thought they would give us a room but communication was always difficult to get.  After spending one night in the King, we finally got our originally booked room.  This meant however we had to haul all of the things we brought (families unfortunately have a lot) to the other room which was difficult.  The lamp in the room had cigarette burns and looked like it was going to fall apart. 
HOUSEKEEPING:   One day we would have only one towel set for three people.  We asked for someone to come up and no one came. Two of the vents were completely covered in lint/dust and needed urgent cleaning.  We asked the front desk to have it taken care of and nothing ever happened (Room 828).  Worst part of all, the sheets had stain marks on them - they were clean but I do recommend to discard if they are still stained after washing - this should have been picked up by housekeeping.  We asked the front desk to change and they did, so we appreciated that.  Dirty glasses were not exchanged with new ones and we didnt receive new waters. Vacuuming was inconsistent.
Check in:  Overall ok, but when unloading our luggage etc, they came with two luggage carts you would find at an airport... we suggest to have more luggage carts available.
BREAKFAST:   While we appreciated very much the breakfast being included it got old real fast - and they only offered “technically” one option - two eggs, fried potatoes and bacon.  I recommend strongly to mix things up for guests staying for full week as this was a challenge for us.  Great staff but just limited selection.  Also less could be more - plates were plentiful and had a lot on them which is a good thing but we felt also like it was a bit much.  Wait staff finally offered us to select from the other menu items which was great, offering our son simple cereal instead of the one choice and pancakes, which were amazing!
Overall we had a good vacation but I think the little details were missing that would have made our stay not only good but excellent.  Hope these comments help the hotel to improve but don’t deter people from staying - its still a good hotel.
Y-12-2020-SconsinWorldTraveler.review_response:
I truly appreciate the time to provide us details on your experience. After reading your review, we will be making some changes. There is no doubt that the best way to improve is to listen to our guests.
I realize there is never a second chance for a great first impression but we would love to welcome you back so you see how you helped you improve.
With regards,
Laura Maldonado
General Manager
Laura.maldonado@hilton.com
Y-12-2020-SconsinWorldTraveler.review_responder: Response from LauraM17135, General Manager at The Gates Hotel South Beach - a DoubleTree by Hilton

Y-11-2020-Coco-Big.review_text:
I'll simply list the problems we encountered during our stay ...
1.  The valet crew was not engaging and gave poor instructions
2. The famous warm cookies upon arrival were cold and difficult to eat
3. The bath towels were the thinnest variety I've ever tried to use
4. The smell of "pot" occasionally wafted through the A/C system on our first day
5. There was mold/mildew in the dressing area where the wall meets the ceiling
6. The cleaning crew was so noisy in the hall we couldn't sleep past 9am
Needless to say, we're not going back.
Y-11-2020-Coco-Big.review_response:
We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback, Coco.
We regret that you had such difficulty during your time with us and that our team didn't go above and beyond to be of assistance. We strive to offer quality service and comfort for our guests and it's also unfortunate your room wasn't cleaned to the high standards we aspire to provide. We'll be sure to address your feedback with our team moving forward.
We do hope you allow us to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.
Y-11-2020-Coco-Big.review_responder: Response from LauraM17135, General Manager at The Gates Hotel South Beach - a DoubleTree by Hilton
